title: [Prize winning advertising films]
brief_description: Four short advertising films which were awarded prizes at an International Advertising Film Festival. 1. ‘Awarded prize for animated models and objects’ - cigarette advertisement by Joop Geesink and Pearl and Dean (Holland and Great Britain). Commercial for de Reske cigarettes entitled ‘No Tax on Tips’. 2. ‘Awarded prize for live action up to 40 metres’ - Spart (France) ‘Chacun a son Tour’ commercial for Ovomaltine. 3. ‘Awarded prize for live action 41 to 80 metres’ - Insel Film (West Germany) for Stenorette dictating machine entitled ‘ Leiden und Freuden’. 4. ‘Awarded prize for live action over 80 metres - Slogan Film (Italy) for supercortemaggiore Petrol and Energol oil. Made for A.C.I.P. entitled ‘40 Anni Dopo’.
